title: Time With The Kids Is Good For Dads, But So Is Providing For The Family FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: It’s no surprise that children benefit when fathers take a bigger role in raising them. But it turns out that fathers benefit greatly, too. A new report titled State of the World’s Fathers, supported in part by the United Nations Population Fund, found that engaged dads live longer than those without close relationships with their […]
